legalResidency.title: Legal residency status in China
legalResidency.description: Live and stay legally in China with official residence permit and government recognition

workPermit.title: Work permit eligibility and business opportunities
workPermit.description: Apply for employment permits and establish business ventures in China's booming economy

banking.title: Access to Chinese banking and financial services
banking.description: Open bank accounts, apply for loans, and access comprehensive Chinese financial services

socialInsurance.title: Social insurance and healthcare benefits
socialInsurance.description: Access China's healthcare system and participate in social insurance programs

familyReunification.title: Family reunification opportunities
familyReunification.description: Bring your family members to China and apply for their residence permits

permanentResidence.title: Path to Chinese permanent residence
permanentResidence.description: Qualify for long-term residence options and potential permanent residence (Chinese Green Card) eligibility
